bug.short_desc: Update links to the applications in the demobrowsers welcome page

long_desc.thetext:
The demo browser features a welcome page which holds links to other applications. We should update the links for the upcoming release (1.5, 1.4.1).
If you close that bug, don't forget to open a new bug for the next release.

Thomas recently introduced a way to use placeholders for versions. Maybe this mechanism could be adopted here?
Btw, we should rethink to (only) link to other external apps from this initial demobrowser page. Rather it should (also) feature demos of the demobrowser itself. Ideas welcome.

(In reply to comment #1) > Thomas recently introduced a way to use placeholders for versions. Maybe this > mechanism could be adopted here? He also added that to that page bug we still need to switch one variable in the page itself.
> Btw, we should rethink to (only) link to other external apps from this initial > demobrowser page. Rather it should (also) feature demos of the demobrowser > itself. Ideas welcome. I would prefer to discuss that in a separate bug.
This is already done for 1.5. I also don't open a bug for 1.6 because Thomas created a script which automatically updates all version numbers in the framework which also taks care of that file.
